mapper.select: select mpc.calendar_no, mpc.plan, mpc.workout_date, cp.name as program_name, m.member_no, m.id as m_id, m.photo as m_photo, m.name as m_name, m.gender as m_gender, m.birth as m_birth, m.tel as m_tel, m.email as m_email, c.coach_no, c.id as c_id, c.photo as c_photo, c.name as c_name, c.gender as c_gender, c.birth as c_birth, c.tel as c_tel, c.email as c_email, mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.status, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.start_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as start_date, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.end_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as end_date from member_program_calendar mpc left outer join member_coaching_programs mcp on mpc.member_program_no = mcp.member_program_no left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = mcp.program_no left outer join coaches c on cp.coach_no = c.coach_no where mpc.member_program_no=#{no} AND mcp.status='진행중'

select mpc.calendar_no, mpc.plan, mpc.workout_date, cp.name as program_name, m.member_no, m.id as m_id, m.name as m_name, c.coach_no, c.id as c_id, c.name as c_name, mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.status, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.start_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as start_date, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.end_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as end_date from member_program_calendar mpc left outer join member_coaching_programs mcp on mpc.member_program_no = mcp.member_program_no left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = mcp.program_no left outer join coaches c on cp.coach_no = c.coach_no where m.member_no=#{no}

select cf.file_no, cf.path, cf.file_type, mpc.calendar_no, mpc.plan, mpc.workout_date, cp.name as program_name, m.member_no, m.id as m_id, m.name as m_name, c.coach_no, c.name as c_name, c.id as c_id, mcp.member_program_no, mcp.member_no, mcp.program_no, mcp.status, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.start_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as start_date, DATE_FORMAT(mcp.end_date, "%Y/%m/%d") as end_date from member_program_calendar mpc left outer join member_coaching_programs mcp on mpc.member_program_no = mcp.member_program_no left outer join members m on mcp.member_no = m.member_no left outer join coaching_programs cp on cp.program_no = mcp.program_no left outer join coaches c on cp.coach_no = c.coach_no left outer join calendar_files cf on cf.calendar_no = mpc.calendar_no where mpc.calendar_no = #{no}
